Articles.Content:
Hello all, I have started working on the Copenhagen Suborbitals ships. I have started work on the Sapphire 1 rocket and I may need a textures person(PM Me if you are interested).

So far, I have only had time to work on Sapphire 1 fuel tank, and I have the CFG's configured and ready. All I need is proper collision meshes and textures

Ships:

Sapphire 1 -- WIP

With the Sapphire here, I have edited the parts to be just bigger than the 0.625 meter parts. Now should I keep it that way or adjust it so it can fit with the probe parts.

Combustion Chamber:

Reference

When I started modeling this engine, I was planning just for the control surfaces and the engine type. I then decided to make a small little detail with the individual bolts for the side of the servos(I think?). I want to know if I should take my time on each part and put little details like this on or not

HATV Engine: (Zoom in a bit)

(Told you I need textures)

SMARAGD -- Coming Soon...

Tycho Deep Space -- Coming Soon...

Tycho Deep Space 2 -- Coming Soon...

Edited June 25, 2013 by TheCanadianVendingMachine
Just make it 64% (or whatever AMP and Soviet pack uses) size.
There is already a sapphire mod, its made by blazingangel665.
Does that mean I can't make one?
No, if anything it will make some competition between you and him to make the best one.
If anyone wants to help with the node attachment points, it will help. Please PM me if you do
Let me know if you need pictures of anything, I will have a look.
Hello, I do need to know the length and height of the HATV on the sapphire. I have put up the model now but I just guessed the part.

This is so awesome. I'm waiting to see what you can come up with !

Godd luck, if you need any help with the modelling I'd be glad to give you advice
